articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Families of Working People Who Moved to New Flats in Changjon Street
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Families of Working People Who Moved to New Flats in Changjon Street
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with his wife Ri Sol Ju, visited families of working people who moved to new flats in Changjon Street.
					The first leg of his visit was the family of Sim Tong Su, teacher at Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering who lives in flat no. 1 on the second floor from the first entrance of Neighborhood Unit 1 of Jongro-dong in Changjon Street.
					
					The new apartment houses in Changjon Street are the ones to which leader Kim Jong Il paid deep attention from sites to designing and building, he said, adding if he were alive, he would visit them before any others.
					
					After looking round every room, he sat down on the floor of the room unreservedly and had a talk with family members. 
					
					He kindly asked them if they liked the new flat, saying he wished to visit apartment houses after being told by senior officials that all settlers liked their new flats and at last spared time to come there. He said he was pleased to hear the family members like everything not only the structure of the flat but its furniture.
					
					Saying that it is a custom of Koreans to visit a new house with a box of matches, he added he brought with him household articles as he could not come there with a match box alone.
					
					I have brought with me "Collections of World Famous Juvenile Stories", he said, asking them to keep them well and hand them over to grandsons to be born. It is not good for eyes if one watches a wide-screen TV from a short distance, he noted. He cheerfully laughed when watching the family members pleased to see a set of vessels.
					
					When he asked them if they have only daughters, he was pleased to hear that a son is now serving in the Korean People's Army.
					
					Learning that the wife is a teacher at a secondary school and all her daughters are teachers, he said with satisfaction that they are a family of educationists.
					
					Devotion and sincerity of teachers are not to be seen now just as the roots of a big tree are not seen but they will find their manifestation when their students will contribute to the prosperity of the country when grown up, he said, noting this family is a patriotic one devoting itself to bringing up the rising generation of the country. This is a worthwhile visit, he added.
					
					Wishing the family members success in their future work, he offered a toast to them with his loving care before having a photo taken with them.
					
					The next leg of his visit was the family of Pak Sung Il, a worker of the City Beautification Office in Central District, who is residing in Flat No. 2 on the second floor.
					
					Taking hands of the family members greeting him with great excitement, he asked them about their jobs. He entered the room, pleased to hear that all of the family members are workers.
					
					He took deep care of their living down to all details as their real father would do. He unreservedly sat down with them who settled in a modern flat with all amenities and had a talk with them.
					
					Taking on his lap the second son of Pak Sung Il and patting him on his cheek, he asked him to which school he goes, how old he is and asked Pak if he had only one son.
					
					He said it was pity to hear that his first son, a third-year student of a secondary school, had not yet come back from school.
					
					He entered a living room and a study room for children. When seeing a painting drawn by the second son, he kindly taught what should be done to finish the painting.
					
					Pak said he could not believe after moving to the flat that it was their flat as they had lived in a single-room flat in the past and now they have a five-room flat. Hearing that the flat is very nice as it is furnished with all kinds of high quality furniture, Kim Jong Un said he was pleased that the masters of the flat liked it.
					
					It is the socialist system in the DPRK that the interests of the people are placed above everything else and all the policies of the party and the state are enforced to serve the people, he said, adding with deep emotion how greatly Kim Jong Il would be pleased if he had seen this reality.
					
					After receiving greetings offered by the first son back home very late, he was very glad to see him and kindly asked him where he had been to.
					
					Being told by him that he came back from a football group training, he heard about his determination to become a football player in the future and hoped his wish would come true.
					
					Kim Jong Un and his wife Ri Sol Ju also offered toasts to Pak Sung Il and his wife and presented them with gifts.
					
					Ri Sol Ju presented the dishes personally cooked by her and let the children taste them and kindly taught how to prepare them.
					
					Kim Jong Un had a picture taken with Pak Sung Il-Jang Sun Nyo family, wishing them happiness in the new flat.
					
					He visited the newly wed family of labor hero Mun Kang Sun, a worker of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, residing in flat No. 1 on the first floor.
					
					After being told that they had a wedding ceremony in May last and received a new flat two months later, he asked with smile if they are happy and how many babies they wish to have in the future.
					
					He laughed a hearty laugh, hearing their wishes to get a son and a daughter who will resemble her mother, hero weaver. 
					
					Hearing the workers' family say words fail to describe how nice their new flat is, he said, adding he feels easy about at the apartment houses in Changjon Street as all people like them so much.
					
					He offered toasts to the newly wed couple, had a picture taken with them and gave them household articles as souvenirs.
					
					Before leaving the flat, he kindly took the hands of the couple with tears rolling down their cheeks, he wished them happiness, adding that he would come to see a baby any time when he passes Changjon Street.

articles.title: British Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception in Congratulation of Success at London Olympics
articles.content:
British Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception in Congratulation of Success at London Olympics
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- British Ambassador to the DPRK Karen Suzanne Wolstenholme gave a reception on Tuesday in congratulation of the success at the 30th Olympic Games in London.
					Present there on invitation were Kim Pyong Sik, vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials concerned, players and coaches and Brazilian Ambassador to the DPRK Roberto Colin.
					
					Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Rajin Port-Wonjong Road to Be Opened to Traffic
articles.content:
Rajin Port-Wonjong Road to Be Opened to Traffic
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Rajin Port-Wonjong road has been reconstructed as one of the projects to be jointly developed and operated by the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and China.
					Its reconstruction gave a facelift to the Rason Economic and Trade Zone, a centre of international transit trade, tourism and service business.
					
					The road links Rajin Port, which draws interest of neighboring countries for its advantageous physiographical condition, and Wonjong-ri facing Hunchun in China with the Tuman River in-between. It extends 50 odd kilometers in total length with 9 meters in width on an average, 16 meters to the maximum.
					
					If the road is opened to traffic, time taken in traveling will decrease by half than before and the traffic capacity will considerably go up.
					
					It will also bring big benefit to freight transit transport and tourism.
					
					The road is due to be opened in September. Its reconstruction project was started in June Juche 100 (2011).
					
					Meanwhile, the DPRK and China expect to build Rajin-Hunchun highway and a bridge across the Tuman River bordering the two countries.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Red Cross Society led by Vice-chairman of its Central Committee Paek Yong Ho left here Tuesday to take part in the meetings of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies to be held in China.
					Arriving here on the same day was a delegation of the Communist Youth Collectives of Spain led by its General Secretary Juan Nogueira Lopez.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Back Home
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Back Home
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, flew back home on Tuesday after participating in the 16th Summit of the Non-aligned Movement and wrapping up his official goodwill visit to Iran.
					Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister, and other suite members also returned home.
					
					They were greeted at the airport by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, and Guan Huabing, charge d' affaires a.i. of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: National Martial Arts Championship Opens
articles.content:
National Martial Arts Championship Opens
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The 7th National Martial Arts Championship for September 10 Prize was opened with due ceremony at the Taekwon-do Hall on Tuesday.
					The championship brought together at least 500 male and female players from 14 units including Taekwon-do teams in Pyongyang and all provinces.
					
					They will compete in Taekwon-do, go and Korean wrestling events.
					
					Present at the opening ceremony were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, players and school youth and students.
					
					Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, made an opening address.

articles.title: Production on Steady Boost at Taedonggang Tile Factory
articles.content:
Production on Steady Boost at Taedonggang Tile Factory
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Tile Factory located on the bank of the River Taedong is making spectacular progress in production in hearty response to the patriotic call of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The factory built thanks to the noble intention of leader Kim Jong Il is now in its heyday.
					
					He visited the newly-built factory in July 2009. Going round its production processes for a long while, he expressed great satisfaction, calling it a youthful and promising one thoroughly based on Juche. He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled to turn it into the nation's leading comprehensive building materials center.
					
					The officials, technicians and workers of the factory introduced the world advanced technology in a bold and creative manner to suit its actual conditions and put the supply of raw materials and fuel on an indigenous basis.
					
					The factory wound up the construction of various production buildings including a building for producing large-size building materials covering at least 20 000 square meters, the general crushing plant and the oxygen-generating plant in a matter of a little over one year in the main after its groundbreaking.
					
					While producing varieties of tiles and roofing ones amounting to millions of square meters every year, the factory completed the assembling of equipment for the processes for the production of crystallite, large tile compounded with glass and large artificial marble tile and the general grinding streamline.
					
					The factory also succeeded in completing new processes for making egg coal for the gasification of anthracite and raw materials for glaze.
					
					It thus realized the gasification of anthracite found in abundance in the country, placing fuel on an indigenous basis. It, at the same time, introduced a reasonable calcinating method, boosting the production of varieties of roofing tiles. 
					
					There is a central computer control room in the factory which controls power, the feeding of raw materials, the production processes and its orders and sales. It is operating a CNC-based high-tension water cutter capable of precisely grinding tiles, building stones, glass and other building materials.
					
					Officials and workers of the factory solved difficult and complicated technological problems in the period of the projects by advancing a lot of technological innovation and invention proposals.
					
					The second-phase project for expanding the capacity of the factory was successfully finished this year, making kilns operational.
					
					The factory entered into a serial production of large high-quality building materials through a single successful test.
					
					The completion of the project helped lay a material and technological foundation for mass-producing large high-quality building materials with local raw materials and indigenous technologies. As a result, the production capacity of the factory almost doubled.
					
					The factory has turned into a model of the times demonstrating the might of the Juche-based industry.

articles.title: Natural Medicine Manufactured in DPRK
articles.content:
Natural Medicine Manufactured in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A natural medicine, made of Fucoidan contained in tangle and seaweed, was manufactured in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					Fucoidan works to stop blood coagulation, purify blood and dissolve harmful ingredients in human body, giving good effect on prevention of senile arteriosclerosis, cerebral thrombosis, hypertension and hyperlipemia.
					
					It improves immunity in human body and keeps cancer from spreading.
					
					It also helps prevent diabetes as it resists rising of glycemia and slackens secretion of insulin.
					
					The Korea Jinung Trading Company manufactures capsule pills with Fucoidan extracted from tangle and seaweed.
					
					Each pill contains 90 percent of Fucoidan.
					
					Fucoidan-contained foodstuff and medicines are popular at home and abroad.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on Everybody to Become Patriot Like Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on Everybody to Become Patriot Like Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday in an editorial calls upon all people to become ardent patriots like leader Kim Jong Il.
					To become a patriot like Kim Jong Il means learning from his patriotic idea and follow the example of his patriotic devotion so that everybody may become a genuine patriot who boundlessly loves the country and devotedly struggles for the country and its people like him, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					Kim Jong Il-style patriot is the most typical patriot, the noblest, the most beautiful and the most ardent.
					
					The value of a patriot is one of the patriotic idea which depends on how true and noble the outlooks on the country, its people and the younger generations are.
					
					The most genuine patriot is ready to live for the country and the nation though one's life may be short. 
					
					The great Kim Jong Il's patriotism put patriotism on the highest level, thus setting the best example of patriotism and showing the acme of socialist patriotism.
					
					This patriotism perfectly clarifies the patriotic traits and quality and ways of patriotic devotion as living examples to be cherished not only by the people at present when they are building a thriving nation but those who will enjoy greatest happiness in the great prosperous powerful nation in the future.
					
					It is the genuine patriots who dedicate themselves to the country of their own accord, regarding patriotism as their vital demand.
					
					Whoever breaths fresh air and drinks clear water in Songun Korea should follow and learn from Kim Jong Il and become patriots like him to be honorable soldiers and disciples who were educated and trained under the loving care of Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great patriot.
					
					Only when the work to embody the immortal Kim Jong Il's patriotism proves successful, can the DPRK shed its brilliant rays as the most beautiful and noblest and the most ideal country full of patriots and the country of the glorious Kim Jong Il's patriotism, the first of its kind in history, which mankind desired and envisioned so much.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Increasing Role of Youth as Young Vanguard
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Increasing Role of Youth as Young Vanguard
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The five million members of the young vanguard constitute a strong pillar and invincible power of the Workers' Party of Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article.
					It goes on:
					
					The Korean youth have demonstrated their might as a vanguard force in pushing forward the revolution and construction in every period and at every stage of the revolutionary development under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					The WPK has embarked upon the road of advance in the new century of Juche revolution. It is proud of having the five million strong elite contingent of young people more powerful than any nuclear weapons and more precious than whatever amount of money.
					
					The article points to the noble ideological and moral traits of the young people of the DPRK.
					
					It goes on:
					
					Youngsters' spiritual world of trusting and following their leader and party is expressed in such self-sacrificing acts as protecting with good care portraits of peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu from flames and rough waters.
					
					More than 1.9 million young people petitioned to be allowed to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army in just a few days, prompted by the desire to mercilessly punish the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea for daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					The successful launch of satellite, such great events as the development of Korean-style CNC technology and the construction of such monumental structures as the Aanbyon Youth Power Station, Youth Hero Motorway, the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm and high-rise apartment houses in Changjon street are associated with shining exploits of lots of known and unknown young men and women.
					
					Thanks to the large contingent of young people, the DPRK has successfully solved the issue of carrying forward a baton of the revolution, construction and party building.
					
					Many legends about the warmest love for young people have been produced in this country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, who has creditably carried forward and developed the great Generalissimos' idea of attaching importance to the youth.
					
					The history of the heroic struggle waged by the young people boundlessly loyal to the party, the country and its people is given steady continuity along with the party's deep trust and love, and the Songun revolutionary cause is wining victory after victory, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Merciless Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Regime
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Merciless Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Regime
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- What remains to be done by Koreans at present is to mete out a stern punishment to the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea and settle accounts with it.
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					A sacred war for national reunification to be fought by all Koreans will be an eruption of their pent-up grudge and resentment against the group which has escalated vicious moves for confrontation and war against the DPRK, the article notes.
					
					Citing facts to prove its crimes, the article goes on:
					
					The "Cheonan" warship sinking incident and the Yonphyong Island shelling incident were orchestrated by the group as hideous anti-DPRK plots at a time when the group of traitors totally violated the historic north-south declarations and escalated confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					The group's reckless military provocations and moves for a war against the DPRK pushed the military tension on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase.
					
					The puppet group massively introduced various types of latest war hardware including weapons of mass destruction by spending a ridiculous amount of money it collected from the south Koreans as taxes. It even sought to sign a military agreement with Japan though its preceding regimes hesitated to do so.
					
					Its confrontation hysteria reached its height when it perpetrated hideous provocations to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					This group of wicked traitors considers it as a means for its existence to rely on foreign forces and go against reunification as it grew from such poisonous roots as treachery. It is, therefore, the inveterate bad habit for the group to pursue confrontation with compatriots till its doomsday.
					
					The prevailing tense situation indicates that the just sacred war for putting an end to political and military provocations of the U.S. and the Lee group and achieving national reunification is the only way for achieving lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					It is the principled stand and firm will of the DPRK to answer provocations with prompt counter-actions and cope with a war of aggression with a just sacred war for national reunification.

articles.title: Victories Are in Store for DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Victories Are in Store for DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Only victories and glory are in store for the DPRK that advances flying high the flag bearing portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, immortal suns, while holding tightly the arms of the revolution to defend the happiness and well-fare of the people and the dignity of the nation, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article.
					The DPRK has become the world-level military power and a legitimate nuclear weapons state that has invincible People's Army demonstrating its might as the strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un ordered the army to make annihilating counter-strike to promptly retaliate against the enemy and all-out counter-attacks to achieve the cause of national reunification if even a bullet is fired into the inviolable land and waters of the DPRK. Then he examined the operational plan for this and finally signed it.
					
					The south Korean puppet regime in fear of retaliation, placed its army on high alert and has closely watched for a peculiar sign from the DPRK even though it recklessly called for severe "punishment" and "counter-strike" in the past.
					
					The U.S., which tried to browbeat the DPRK after bringing huge troops to south Korea, has gone busy, while calling for carefully watching the developments and suspending or resuming the exercises.
					
					Foreign media said that the U.S. and south Korea have regularly staged joint military exercises so far but they have never been hit as hard as this time. They were unanimous in saying that Ulji Freedom Guardian exercises ended up in anti-climax.
					
					The world will clearly see once again how peace will be ensured on the Korean Peninsula and how strong the Songun politics of the DPRK is.

articles.title: Abolition of "Security Law" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of "Security Law" Demanded in S. Korea
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- South Korean Internet newspaper Jaju Minbo carried the letter written by its Representative Ri Chang Gi behind bars in demand of the repeal of the fascist "Security Law" (SL) on August 31.
					In the letter he deplored that it is only south Korea where anyone praising the north is thrown behind bars on charge of violation of the SL.
					
					It is as foolish an act as finding a fish on a tree for the south Korean authorities to talk about "dialogue" with the north while antagonizing the north and invoking the SL, it said.
					
					If they truly want dialogue with the north, they should immediately abolish the SL before anything else, it held.
					
					This was proved by the total suspension of the tour of Mt. Kumgang, it noted, stressing it is possible to develop relations with the north when the SL is repealed.

articles.title: S. Korea's Call for "Policy Change" and "Reform, Opening" in DPRK Rebuked
articles.content:
S. Korea's Call for "Policy Change" and "Reform, Opening" in DPRK Rebuked
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime is talking about "aid" to the DPRK while clamoring again for "policy change" and "reform and opening".
					The regime is playing a trick in fear of the declaration of the DPRK that it would wage a just war for reunification and make merciless retaliation.
					
					It is a crafty trick to shirk its responsibility for creating a touch-and-go situation in the Korean Peninsula and the region through moves for a war against the DPRK. This is also aimed to calm down the strong spirit of the DPRK to wage merciless counterstrike.
					
					As proven, the regime, which made a false show of courage to provoke a new war with the backing of its U.S. master, has been put to shame together with the master in the world eyes.
					
					The enemies were hit hard even before kicking off the war operation in the face of the strong spirit of the army and people of the DPRK to annihilate the enemy and stage a great war for national reunification by the order of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					When Ulji Freedom Guardian war exercises reached the height, typhoon hit south Korea. This put the enemies in a flurry of whether to continue or stop the exercises.
					
					The exercises have thus fallen through. Those who go reckless, unaware of their rivals are bound to fail.
					
					As the DPRK clearly stated to the world, the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government are consistent in their stand to defend socialist country and win victories in a great war for national reunification and in the building of a thriving nation by dint of Songun.
					
					Calls for "policy change" and "reform and opening" in the DPRK will only reveal the ignorance of the DPRK and sordid intention against it.
					
					It is ridiculous for the Lee Myung Bak regime whose fate is at stake to talk about "aid" conditional on the DPRK's option for "policy change".
					
					This is just rubbish of blind men ignorant of the cause of the DPRK and last-ditch efforts of pro-U.S. stooges keen on prolonging their remaining days by escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					Tragedy is that the enemies have no knowledge of the DPRK, a main reason that they fail in all the showdowns with it.
					
					The DPRK will as always shatter every provocation of the enemies at a single stroke and surely build a reunified prosperous and powerful country on this land under the uplifted banner of Juche and Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Head of Koreans Organization in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Head of Koreans Organization in Russia
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the banquet given to celebrate August 25, the anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership, Jang Sun Jong, chairperson of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, said in an excited tone on Sept. 1:
					Marshal Kim Jong Un made a bomb-like speech recently, making the large-scale war moves for aggression staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces with troops of satellite countries involved end in bubbles.
					
					Praising Kim Jong Un as the greatest general in the world, the chairperson went on: 
					
					The enemies seemed to ignite a real war but when they heard the speech of Kim Jong Un, they became dumb-founded and took to flight. 
					
					When the U.S. attempted to provoke a war after causing "Pueblo" incident, Generalissimo Kim Il Sung made a speech to the effect that the DPRK will counter 'retaliation' with retaliation and cope with all-out war with all-out war, bringing it to submission. Kim Jong Un brought the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to submission once again by making a speech to the effect that the Korean People's Army will react to provocations with prompt deadly counter-blows and cope with a war for aggression with a sacred cause of justice for the country's reunification.
					
					This time the enemies must have clearly understood what type of man the Marshal of the DPRK is, what pluck, courage and will he has and how strong the DPRK is.
					
					The enemies would not dare recklessly play with fire.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Russian Paper
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Selskaya Zhizn on August 23 carried the detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country".
					The work, made public on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of leader Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his career characterized by ardent love for the country and its people.
					
					It also clarifies important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech Given Wide Publicity by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech Given Wide Publicity by Foreign Media
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The news that Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was present at the banquet given to celebrate August 25, the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership, and made a speech there was given wide publicity by foreign media between August 26 and 29.
					Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., Hong Kong, China noted:
					
					Kim Jong Un said that it is the steadfast determination and will of the Workers' Party of Korea to defend the security of the country and the gains of revolution and build a reunified thriving nation, more tightly holding the arms of Songun provided by Kim Jong Il with much effort while leading the Songun revolution all his life.
					
					Kim Jong Un went to the forefront units of the southwestern sector of the front and issued an order to the whole army that it should keep itself highly alerted and watch with high vigilance the reckless moves of the enemies and if they fire even a single shell on the inviolable territory and territorial waters of the DPRK, it should deal prompt deadly counter-blows at them and turn out as one to lead the battle to an all-out counterattack for achieving the great cause of national reunification. He examined and finally signed the operation plan for implementing it.
					
					The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK in its Internet homepage said: Kim Jong Un said he renews the resolution to invariably take the road of Songun traversed by Kim Jong Il, calling on the army and people to hold more tightly the arms of the revolution in protection of happiness and safety of the people and the dignity of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					His speech was also reported by Xinhua Daily Telegraph, Internet homepages Northeast Network, Northeast Press Network and Jillin Network of China, the Russian Internet News Asiatski Reportsor, the Vietnamese paper Nhan Dan, the Cambodian paper Phnom Penh Post, the Bangladeshi papers Ekota and Blits, the Iranian paper Iran Daily and Press TV, the Indian papers Asian Age, Indian Express and Statesman, the India-Asia News Agency, the Kuwaiti paper Arab Times and Internet homepage of the Brazilian Communist Party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech Hailed in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech Hailed in Peru
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute issued a joint statement on August 27 after receiving the speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, at the banquet given to celebrate August 25, the anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					The statement said that Marshal Kim Jong Un in his speech re-clarified his firm will to successfully carry forward the Songun cause of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, firmly defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation from the imperialists' invasion and build a reunified thriving country.
					
					No force on earth can block the Korean people in their effort to build a thriving nation and achieve the country's reunification, the statement said, adding:
					
					Only victory and glory are in store for the DPRK advancing under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un, flying high the immortal flags bearing portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					The Peruvian Group for the Study of KimilsungismÔºçKimjongilism in a statement noted that the Peruvian people and the world progressive peoples extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause of foiling the moves of the imperialists' allied forces to provoke a war of aggression and winning a final victory in the great war for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Feats Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Feats Lauded Abroad
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- An international organization and foreign countries posted articles on their Internet homepages between August 21 and 27 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					The Women's International Democratic Federation posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Undying Songun feats".
					
					The article said that on August 25, 1960 he started his Songun revolutionary leadership. His Songun leadership for more than half a century ushered in a new era of prosperity unprecedented in the history of the Korean nation spanning 5 000 years, it added.
					
					He paid deep attention to bolstering up the military muscle of the Korean People's Army, it noted, and went on:
					
					The KPA has grown to be a matchless army with powerful offensive and defensive means and nuclear deterrent under his care. He turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power based on single-minded unity through his Songun leadership. The army and people of the DPRK could achieve the unbreakable single-minded unity, rallied close around the Workers' Party of Korea under his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					Epochal changes have taken place in economic construction and in the efforts to improve the standard of the people's living in the DPRK in recent years under his energetic leadership.
					
					Articles praising his Songun feats were posted on Internet homepage "The Juche idea" of the Socialist Party of Romania, Internet homepage "The DPRK" of Poland and Internet homepages of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked Abroad
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Pakistan, Bangladesh and Cambodia between August 21 and 23 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					At the seminar held in Pakistan several personages praised the undying Songun feats performed by Kim Jong Il, saying that he ushered in a new era of prosperity unprecedented in the history of the Korean nation spanning 5 000 years with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy noted:
					
					Kim Jong Il, who developed in depth the Songun idea of President Kim Il Sung, formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism and led the Korean people to bring about epoch-making changes in the revolution and construction.
					
					The Korean people could firmly protect their dignity despite the present complicated international situation entirely because they have bolstered up the military capability in every way under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					The Korean people are sure to win in building a thriving nation thanks to the Songun politics, a treasured sword for winning sure victory and invincible banner.
					
					The editor-in-chief of the Cambodian paper Pracheachon sincerely hoped that the Korean People's Army will grow stronger under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					A message to him was adopted at the seminar in Pakistan.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in Russia
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition and film show took place in Vladivostok City of Maritime Territory of Russia on August 22 on the occasions of the 10th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's visit to the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation, the first anniversary of his visit to the Siberian and Far Eastern Regions, the 52nd anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership and the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					Displayed in the venue were photos showing feats performed by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					Also on display there were books on the revolutionary careers of the peerlessly great persons and handicraft works associated with the excellent cultural tradition of the Korean nation and creative talents of Koreans.
					
					Speakers said at the event that it is of very important significance to hold the event to mark the anniversary of his visit to the Siberian and Far Eastern Regions at the Pacific Fleet visited by him.
					
					The Russian people are attaching importance to the friendly relations between the two countries and are sincerely rejoiced over the achievements made by the fraternal Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, they noted, adding:
					
					The event offered an opportunity to know better about the noble spiritual world of the Korean people dynamically advancing along the road of a final victory, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					They expressed great admiration for Kim Jong Un who, while visiting islet defence detachments stationed in the biggest hotspot in the southernmost area of the southwestern sector of the front, displayed ardent patriotism and showed warm loving care for service personnel. They, at the same time, were deeply moved by the servicepersons' intense loyalty to him.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Marked in Different Countries
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Film shows were held in Cambodia, India, Malaysia and Thailand between August 16 and 22 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					The principal of Indraprasta State-run School of India said that Kim Jong Il started his Songun leadership with an inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, turning the DPRK into an invincible socialist bulwark which no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					Kim Jong Il's Songun feats will shine long thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the principal added.
					
					The director of the Premium Commodity Company of Malaysia said that the DPRK will win victory after victory as long as there are the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and the army and people absolutely trusting in and following him.
					
					The director of the Mariners' Shipping and Trading Company of Thailand stressed that Songun is the best way for defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation at present when the imperialists are becoming all the more undisguised in their high-handed and arbitrary practices.

articles.title: U.S.-Japan Joint Military Drill Assailed
articles.content:
U.S.-Japan Joint Military Drill Assailed
						
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Japan Ground "Self-defence Force" and the U.S. marines in Okinawa staged joint exercises in Hitsudai exercise ground in Oida Prefecture from August 19 to 30, according to a report.
					Timed to coincide with this, Japan and the U.S. held joint military drill on Guam in the west Pacific and on an island of the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.
					
					Minju Joson Tuesday in a bylined commentary brands this as a reckless war provocation exercise aimed at attack and aggression.
					
					Disclosing the sinister intention of Japan in getting zealously involved in the joint drill with the U.S. forces in the Asia-Pacific region, the commentary goes on:
					
					The U.S. seeks to shift the focus of its military strategy to the Asia-Pacific and hold military hegemony in the region. Here it is going to use Japan as a major ally.
					
					It is for this reason that the U.S. has left no means untried to tighten military nexus with Japan.
					
					Japan, on the other hand, moves to put the U.S. aim to effective use for realizing its ambition for becoming a military giant and launching reinvasion.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries aim to step up its drive for emerging a military power and boosting military capabilities for launching overseas invasion by availing themselves of the present situation in which the U.S. needs its help for realizing the Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					The strengthening of military tie-up between Japan and the U.S. is a dangerous military act of seriously harassing regional peace and stability. So this can never be justified.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries' moves to emerge a military power and realize its militarist ambition for overseas expansion backed by the U.S. is a wild dream that can never come true.
					
					The Asian people will never tolerate Japan's moves to follow in the footsteps of its predecessors who committed hideous crimes.

articles.title: Leader of Islamic Revolution of Iran Calls for Unity among NAM Countries
articles.content:
Leader of Islamic Revolution of Iran Calls for Unity among NAM Countries
						
Tehran, September 3 (KCNA) -- Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran, called for boosting the unity and friendship among the non-aligned countries on Aug. 31.
					He said that unity and friendship would help increase the might of member states of the Non-Aligned Movement and protect their interests.
					
					Accusing the hegemonic forces of trying to demonstrate their "strength" through propaganda means, he stressed the historic experience shows that only resistance can overpower the arrogant forces.

articles.title: Reconstruida carretera Puerto Rajin-Wonjong
articles.content:
Reconstruida carretera Puerto Rajin-Wonjong
						
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo reconstruida la carretera Puerto Rajin-Wonjong, uno de los proyectos de desarrollo y administracion conjuntos entre Corea y China. 
					De esa forma, fue renovado el perfil de la zona economico-comercial de Rason como base de comercio intermedio, turismo y servicio de talla internacional.
					
					La carretera une al puerto Rajin, que centra la atencion de los paises vecinos por sus favorables condiciones naturales y geograficas, con la comuna de Wonjong situada enfrente de la ciudad china de Hunchun con el rio Tuman en el medio.
					
					La extension total de la via es mas de 50km y su anchura es de 9 metros como promedio y 16 metros al maximo.
					
					Cuando sea inaugurada, ella permitira reducir mas de la mitad el tiempo de viaje en autos y elevar notablemente la capacidad de paso de los medios de transporte.
					
					Traera ademas un viraje en el transporte intermediario de cargas y el turismo.
					
					La ceremonia de apertura esta prevista para septiembre. 
					
					Tuvo lugar en junio de 100 (2011) de la Era Juche la ceremonia de comienzo de la obra de reconstruccion.
					
					Por otra parte, Corea y China planean construir la autopista Rajin-Hunchun y un nuevo puente en el rio fronterizo Tuman.

articles.title: Ampliada Fabrica de Azulejo Taedonggang entra en plena produccion
articles.content:
Ampliada Fabrica de Azulejo Taedonggang entra en plena produccion
						
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En acato al llamamiento patriotico del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los obreros de la Fabrica de Azulejo Taedonggang lograron un desarrollo sorprendente.
					La fabrica, construida segun el noble proposito del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, esta situada a la ribera del pintoresco rio Taedong.
					
					Durante su visita en julio de 2009, Kim Jong Il se mostro muy satisfecho calificando la fabrica de joven y prometedora y presento las tareas importantes para convertirla en una renombrada base de produccion de materiales de construccion.
					
					Los funcionarios, tecnicos y obreros de la fabrica introdujeron con valentia y creatividad al estilo coreano las tecnologias avanzadas del mundo y lograron normalizar la produccion con las materias primas y combustibles nacionales.
					
					Durante un ano y pico desde el inicio de construccion de la fabrica, termino principalmente la edificacion de varios inmuebles tales como el edificio de produccion de los materiales de construccion de gran tamano con mas de 20 mil metros cuadrados de superficie, el campo de trituracion combinada y el de generacion de oxigeno.
					
					Al paralelo de la intensa lucha por producir y suministrar cada ano los azulejos y tejas de varios tipos, quedaron terminados el montaje de los equipos de los procesos de produccion de azulejos compuestos de vidrio de gran tamano y azulejos de marmol artificial de gran tamano y la cadena combinada de pulido.
					
					Al gasificar la antracita abundante en Corea, se resolvio el problema de combustible y se introdujo un racional metodo de calcinacion.
					
					Quedo acondicionada magnificamente la sala de control computarizada y se ha hecho la maquina cortadora CNC capaz de elaborar a precision los azulejos, los materiales de piedra y los vidrios y otros materiales de construccion.
					
					Todos los funcionarios y obreros resolvieron juntos los dificiles problemas tecnicos surgidos durante la reconstruccion de la fabrica.
					
					Termino con exito este ano la obra de ampliacion de capacidad de segunda etapa, fueron encendidos los hornos de calcinacion y comenzo la produccion en cadena de los materiales de construccion de gran tamano y alta calidad.
					
					De esta manera, se ha duplicado casi la capacidad de produccion de la fabrica.
					
					La Fabrica de Azulejo Taedonggang, que produce en avalanchas los materiales de construccion de buena calidad con arenas, piedras y carbones abundantes en Corea, deviene la paradigmatica de la epoca que hace alarde del poderio de la industria del Juche que avanza a galopes hacia el nivel mundial.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia la fiebre de reagresion de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia la fiebre de reagresion de reaccionarios japoneses
						
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Segun trascendidos, tuvo lugar del 19 al 30 de agosto en el campo de entrenamiento de Hitsudai en el departamento de Oida los ejercicios conjuntos Japon-Estados Unidos en que se movilizaron las "fuerzas terrestres de autodefensa" y la infanteria de marina de Estados Unidos ocupante de Okinawa.
					Al mismo tiempo, ambos paises libraron otra maniobra conjunta en Guam del Pacifico del Oeste y una isla de Commonwealth de las Marianas del Norte, etc.
					
					En un comentario individual difundido este martes, el periodico Minju Joson revelo que esos ejercicios de guerra persiguieron de punta a cabo el ataque y la agresion.
					
					El comentarista expuso el intento malsano con que Japon toma parte activa en los ejercicios conjuntos con las tropas norteamericanas en la region de Asia-Pacifico en las siguientes lineas:
					
					Ultimamente, EE.UU. desplazo el enfoque de su estrategia militar a la region de Asia-Pacifico y persigue la heguemonia militar en esta region considerando a Japon como su aliado principal.
					
					Por eso, EE.UU. usa todos los medios y metodos por fortalecer el contubernio militar con Japon.
					
					Japon pretende aprovechar a su vez tal intento del imperio para convertirse en potencia militar y realizar la ambicion de reagresion a ultramar.
					
					El fortalecimiento de la alianza militar Japon-EE.UU. es un paso aventurero que destruye gravemente la paz y la estabilidad de la region.
					
					Es irrealizable la intencion de reaccionarios japoneses de convertirse en potencia militar y expandirse a ultramar mediante la reagresion militarista con la ayuda de EE.UU.
					
					Los pueblos asiaticos no toleraran jamas a Japon que pretende repetir su ignominioso expediente del pasado.

articles.title: Politica hostil de EE.UU. es escollo principal al problema nuclear (III)
articles.content:
Politica hostil de EE.UU. es escollo principal al problema nuclear (III)
						
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea (ACNC) transmite abajo la tercera parte "La renuncia de la politica hostil es el requisito de la solucion del problema nuclear" del memorando "La politica hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de Estados Unidos es el escollo principal para la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana" publicado el 31 de agosto por el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC:
					Se hace cada dia mas dificil la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana debido a la politica hostil de EE.UU. 
					
					Y en la etapa actual no es radiante la perspectiva de ser renunciada esa politica norteamericana. 
					
					A diferencia de las palabras de las autoridades de la administracion norteamericana de "no tener intencion hostil" a la RPDC, las acciones de EE.UU. con respecto a esta se tornan cada dia mas hostiles. 
					
					En abril pasado, EE.UU. violo flagrantemente los derechos independientes de la RPDC, Estado soberano, acusandole injustamente del lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos. Y las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea realizaron los ejercicios de tiro de gran dimension tomando por blanco la bandera de la RPDC. 
					
					En seguida, el organo intrigante de inteligencia del Sur de Corea trazo la conspiracion de destruir las estatuas de bronce de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu bajo el mando del organo de inteligencia de EE.UU. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno se aumentan los ejercicios belicos bilaterales o trilaterales entre EE.UU. y sus lacayos, se hace cada dia mas evidente su caracter ofensivo y se amplia su esfera. 
					
					Todos los hechos muestran que se intensifica de modo escalonado el grado de hostilidad a la RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					Esto esta relacionado con la nueva estrategia de defensa nacional de EE.UU., publicada el 5 de enero de 2012 por la administracion Obama. 
					
					La nueva estrategia plantea trasladar hasta 2020 de Europa a la region de Asia-Pacifico el 10 por ciento de las fuerzas armadas norteamericanas estacionadas en ultramar para que en esa region se concentre el 60 por ciento de tales efectivos. 
					
					En general, el aumento armamentista requiere el pretexto de la "existencia o la amenaza del enemigo". 
					
					En este sentido, en el Nordeste Asiatico la RPDC es la unica enemiga de EE.UU. Las potencias estan acostumbradas a abstenerse de describir publicamente como enemiga a otra potencia. Pues,  EE.UU. quiere mantener a la RPDC como enemiga en muchos anos futuros, hasta que se cumpla su nueva estrategia de defensa, para justificar el aumento de sus fuerzas armadas. 
					
					Ademas, la nueva estrategia no da ninguna garantia de que EE.UU. no atacaria a la RPDC para apretar el cerco militar sobre las potencias de Eurasia al ocupar toda la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					La situacion creada urge a la RPDC detener de todos modos el estallido de nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y hacer los preparativos perfectos para trasladar a la batalla por la reunificacion de la patria cuando se desate la guerra. 
					
					Esto es el motivo y la situacion de fondo que obligaron a la RPDC a revisar generalmente el problema nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. tiene dos opciones.
					
					La primera es cambiar valiente y radicalmente su modo de pensar del periodo de la Guerra Fria y renunciar su anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC para contribuir a la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y afianzar la seguridad nacional.
					
					Si EE.UU. muestra con sus acciones la voluntad de hacerlo, la RPDC esta lista a responderle en cualquier momento. 
					
					El gran Dirigente Kim Jong Il dijo el 4 de agosto de 1997 que no consideramos a EE.UU. como enemigo jurado sino deseamos la normalizacion de las relaciones RPDC-EE.UU. 
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un desea abrir una nueva coyuntura de desarrollo de las relaciones con todos los paises que nos tratan con amabilidad, sin hacer caso de las relaciones del pasado. 
					
					La otra via es seguir manteniendo como ahora la politica hostil, frente a la cual la RPDC aumentaria constantemente su arsenal nuclear.
					
					Si EE.UU. se obstina en sacar sus provechos sacrificando los intereses de la RPDC, esta se vera obligada a enfrentarle con intransigencia hasta el final.
					
					La RPDC ya es el digno pais con armas nucleares y ya paso completamente la era en que EE.UU. la amenazaba con bombas atomicas. 
					
					No observaremos solo con brazos cruzados las crecientes maniobras hostiles de EE.UU. sino haremos todo lo posible por defender el destino del pais y nacion. 
					
					Seria una gran equivocacion considerar como una tactica la posicion intransigente de la RPDC. 
					
					Hemos poseido las armas nucleares no para hacer negocios con EE.UU. sino para hacer frente a ese mayor poseedor de armas nucleares del mundo que intenta a atacarnos. 
					
					El disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC es el remedio omnipotente para prevenir la guerra y defender fidedignamente la paz y la estabilidad en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					En el caso de que EE.UU. no tome la opcion correcta, sera prolongada inevitablemente la tenencia de armas nucleares por la RPDC y el disuasivo nuclear de esta se tornara modernizado y ampliado en un nivel fuera de la imaginacion del primero.
